00055 /* Start by loading up autoconf definitions */
00056 
00057 #include <bbsconfig.h>
00058 
00059 
00060 /* Always include standard string/memory headers
00061    and integer types. */
00062 
00063 #include <stdio.h>
00064 #include <stdlib.h>
00065 #include <ctype.h>
00066 #ifdef STDC_HEADERS
00067 #  define WANT_STRING_H 1
00068 #endif
00069 #ifdef HAVE_STDINT_H
00070 #  include <stdint.h>
00071 #else
00072 #  ifdef HAVE_SYS_INT_TYPES_H
00073 #    include <sys/int_types.h>
00074 #  endif
00075 #endif
00076 
00077 
00078 
00079 /* sys/types.h and friends */
00080 
00081 #ifdef HAVE_SYS_TYPES_H
00082 #  include <sys/types.h>
00083 #endif
00084 #ifdef HAVE_SYS_INT_TYPES_H
00085 #  include <sys/int_types.h>
00086 #endif

00088 
00089 /* The dirent stuff */
00090 
00091 #ifdef WANT_DIRENT_H
00092 #  ifdef HAVE_DIRENT_H
00093 #    include <dirent.h>
00094 #    define NAMLEN(dirent) strlen((dirent)->d_name)
00095 #  else
00096 #    define dirent dirent
00097 #    define NAMLEN(dirent) (dirent)->d_namlen
00098 #    ifdef HAVE_SYS_NDIR_H
00099 #      include <sys/ndir.h>
00100 #    endif
00101 #    ifdef HAVE_SYS_DIR_H
00102 #      include <sys/dir.h>
00103 #    endif
00104 #    ifdef HAVE_NDIR_H
00105 #      include <ndir.h>
00106 #    endif
00107 #  endif
00108 #endif

00115 #else

00117 #    include <ltdl.h>
00118 #  endif
00119 #endif

00122 /* The wait() function calls */
00123 
00124 #ifdef WANT_SYS_WAIT_H
00125 #  define WANT_WAIT_H
00126 #endif
00127 #ifdef WANT_WAIT_H
00128 #  ifdef HAVE_SYS_WAIT_H
00129 #    include <sys/wait.h>
00130 #  endif
00131 #  ifndef WEXITSTATUS
00132 #    define WEXITSTATUS(stat_val) ((unsigned)(stat_val)>>8)
00133 #  endif
00134 #  ifndef WIFEEXITED
00135 #    define WIFEEXITED(stat_val) (((stat_val)&255)==0)
00136 #  endif
00137 #endif

00164 #  define WANT_TIME_H 1
00165 #endif
00166 #ifdef WANT_TIME_H
00167 #  ifdef TIME_WITH_SYS_TIME
00168 #    include <sys/time.h>
00169 #    include <time.h>
00170 #  else
00171 #    ifdef HAVE_SYS_TIME_H

00180 /* SLang or Curses (have to cater for several broken setups, including
00181    mine :-) ) */
00182 
00183 #ifdef WANT_CURSES_H
00184 #  define WANT_NCURSES_H 1
00185 #endif
00186 #ifdef WANT_SLANG_H
00187 #  define WANT_NCURSES_H 1
00188 #endif
00189 #ifdef WANT_NCURSES_H
00190 #  ifdef HAVE_LIBSLANG
00191 #    ifdef HAVE_SLANG_SLANG_H
00192 #      include <slang/slang.h>
00193 #    elif defined(HAVE_SLANG_H)
00194 #      include <slang.h>
00195 #    endif
00196 #    ifdef HAVE_SLANG_SLCURSES_H
00197 #      ifndef __SLCURSES_H
00198 #        define __SLCURSES_H
00199 #        include <slang/slcurses.h>
00200 #      endif
00201 #    elif defined(HAVE_SLCURSES_H
00202 #      ifndef __SLCURSES_H
00203 #        define __SLCURSES_H
00204 #        include <slcurses.h>
00205 #      endif
00206 #    endif
00207 #  elif defined(HAVE_LIBNCURSES)
00208 #    ifdef HAVE_NCURSES_H
00209 #      include <ncurses.h>
00210 #    elif defined(HAVE_NCURSES_NCURSES_H)
00211 #      include <ncurses/ncurses.h>
00212 #    elif defined(HAVE_CURSES_NCURSES_H)
00213 #      include <curses/ncurses.h>
00214 #    endif
00215 #  elif defined(HAVE_LIBCURSES)
00216 #    ifdef HAVE_CURSES_H
00217 #      include <curses.h>
00218 #    elif defined(HAVE_CURSES_CURSES_H)
00219 #      include <curses/curses.h>
00220 #    elif defined(HAVE_NCURSES_CURSES_H)
00221 #      include <ncurses/curses.h>
00222 #    endif
00223 #  endif
00224 #endif
